mapper.select:
SELECT count(sn.mm_emp_id) FROM mm_emp sn WHERE 1=1 AND sn.mm_emp_nickname is not NULL
AND sn.mm_emp_regtime like CONCAT('%',#{mm_emp_regtime},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE mm_emp SET mm_emp_nickname=#{mm_emp_nickname}, mm_emp_mobile=#{mm_emp_mobile}, mm_emp_card=#{mm_emp_card}, mm_emp_type=#{mm_emp_type}, mm_emp_company=#{mm_emp_company}, mm_emp_company_type=#{mm_emp_company_type}, mm_emp_company_address=#{mm_emp_company_address}, mm_emp_company_detail=#{mm_emp_company_detail}, mm_emp_company_url=#{mm_emp_company_url}, mm_emp_provinceId=#{mm_emp_provinceId}, mm_emp_cityId=#{mm_emp_cityId}, mm_emp_countryId=#{mm_emp_countryId}, mm_emp_regtime=#{mm_emp_regtime}, mm_emp_endtime=#{mm_emp_endtime}, mm_level_id=#{mm_level_id}, mm_emp_beizhu=#{mm_emp_beizhu}, mm_emp_msg_num=#{mm_emp_msg_num}, is_login=#{is_login}, is_fabugongying=#{is_fabugongying}, is_fabuqiugou=#{is_fabuqiugou}, is_fabugongying_see=#{is_fabugongying_see}, is_fabuqiugou_see=#{is_fabuqiugou_see}, is_see_all=#{is_see_all}, is_pic=#{is_pic}, is_chengxin=#{is_chengxin}, is_miaomu=#{is_miaomu}, is_use=#{is_use}, lat=#{lat}, lng=#{lng}, mm_msg_length=#{mm_msg_length}, lat_company=#{lat_company}, lng_company=#{lng_company}, is_cover=#{is_cover}, is_special=#{is_special}, is_video=#{is_video}, ischeck=#{ischeck} WHERE mm_emp_id=#{mm_emp_id}
mapper.select: SELECT sn.* ,lev.mm_level_name as levelName,lev.mm_level_num as mm_level_num, hatp.province as provinceName, hatc.city as cityName, hata.area as areaName from mm_emp sn LEFT JOIN mm_level lev ON sn.mm_level_id=lev.mm_level_id LEFT JOIN hat_province hatp ON sn.mm_emp_provinceId=hatp.provinceID LEFT JOIN hat_city hatc ON sn.mm_emp_cityId=hatc.cityID LEFT JOIN hat_area hata ON sn.mm_emp_countryId=hata.areaID WHERE sn.mm_emp_id=#{mm_emp_id}

SELECT sn.* ,lev.mm_level_name as levelName,lev.mm_level_num as mm_level_num, hatp.province as provinceName, hatc.city as cityName, hata.area as areaName from mm_emp sn LEFT JOIN mm_level lev ON sn.mm_level_id=lev.mm_level_id LEFT JOIN hat_province hatp ON sn.mm_emp_provinceId=hatp.provinceID LEFT JOIN hat_city hatc ON sn.mm_emp_cityId=hatc.cityID LEFT JOIN hat_area hata ON sn.mm_emp_countryId=hata.areaID WHERE sn.mm_emp_mobile=#{mm_emp_mobile}

SELECT sn.* ,lev.mm_level_name as levelName,lev.mm_level_num as mm_level_num, hatp.province as provinceName, hatc.city as cityName, hata.area as areaName from mm_emp sn LEFT JOIN mm_level lev ON sn.mm_level_id=lev.mm_level_id LEFT JOIN hat_province hatp ON sn.mm_emp_provinceId=hatp.provinceID LEFT JOIN hat_city hatc ON sn.mm_emp_cityId=hatc.cityID LEFT JOIN hat_area hata ON sn.mm_emp_countryId=hata.areaID WHERE sn.mm_emp_card=#{mm_emp_card}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mm_emp(mm_emp_cover,mm_emp_company_pic,mm_emp_company_url,mm_emp_id, mm_emp_mobile, mm_emp_nickname,mm_emp_card, mm_emp_password, mm_emp_type, mm_emp_company, mm_emp_company_type, mm_emp_company_address, mm_emp_company_detail, mm_emp_provinceId, mm_emp_cityId, mm_emp_countryId, mm_emp_regtime, mm_emp_endtime, mm_level_id, mm_emp_beizhu, mm_emp_msg_num, is_login, is_fabugongying, is_fabuqiugou, is_fabuqiugou_see, is_fabugongying_see, is_see_all, is_use, is_pic, is_chengxin, is_miaomu, lat, lng, ischeck,is_upate_profile,mm_msg_length,lat_company,lng_company,is_video) VALUES (#{mm_emp_cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mm_emp_company_pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mm_emp_company_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mm_emp_id}, #{mm_emp_mobile},#{mm_emp_nickname}, #{mm_emp_card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mm_emp_password},#{mm_emp_type},#{mm_emp_company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mm_emp_company_type},#{mm_emp_company_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mm_emp_company_detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mm_emp_provinceId},#{mm_emp_cityId},#{mm_emp_countryId},#{mm_emp_regtime},#{mm_emp_endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mm_level_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mm_emp_beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mm_emp_msg_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{is_login},#{is_fabugongying},#{is_fabuqiugou},#{is_fabuqiugou_see},#{is_fabugongying_see},#{is_see_all},#{is_use},#{is_pic},#{is_chengxin},#{is_miaomu},#{lat},#{lng},#{ischeck},#{is_upate_profile},#{mm_msg_length,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lat_company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lng_company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{is_video,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO mm_emp(mm_emp_id, mm_emp_mobile, mm_emp_nickname,mm_emp_password,mm_emp_cover, mm_emp_type, mm_emp_company, mm_emp_company_type, mm_emp_company_url,mm_emp_company_address, mm_emp_company_detail, mm_emp_provinceId, mm_emp_cityId, mm_emp_countryId, mm_emp_regtime, mm_level_id, mm_emp_beizhu, mm_emp_msg_num, is_login, is_fabugongying, is_fabuqiugou, is_fabuqiugou_see, is_fabugongying_see, is_see_all, is_use, is_pic, is_chengxin, is_miaomu, ischeck) VALUES
(#{item.mm_emp_id}, #{item.mm_emp_mobile}, #{item.mm_emp_nickname}, #{item.mm_emp_password}, #{item.mm_emp_cover}, #{item.mm_emp_type}, #{item.mm_emp_company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mm_emp_company_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mm_emp_company_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mm_emp_company_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mm_emp_company_detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mm_emp_provinceId}, #{item.mm_emp_cityId}, #{item.mm_emp_countryId}, #{item.mm_emp_regtime}, #{item.mm_level_id}, #{item.mm_emp_beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mm_emp_msg_num}, #{item.is_login}, #{item.is_fabugongying}, #{item.is_fabuqiugou}, #{item.is_fabuqiugou_see}, #{item.is_fabugongying_see}, #{item.is_see_all}, #{item.is_use}, #{item.is_pic}, #{item.is_chengxin}, #{item.is_miaomu}, #{item.ischeck})
mapper.select:
SELECT sn.* ,lev.mm_level_name as levelName,lev.mm_level_num as mm_level_num, hatp.province as provinceName, hatc.city as cityName, hata.area as areaName from mm_emp sn LEFT JOIN mm_level lev ON sn.mm_level_id=lev.mm_level_id LEFT JOIN hat_province hatp ON sn.mm_emp_provinceId=hatp.provinceID LEFT JOIN hat_city hatc ON sn.mm_emp_cityId=hatc.cityID LEFT JOIN hat_area hata ON sn.mm_emp_countryId=hata.areaID WHERE 1=1 AND sn.mm_emp_type = '0'
AND sn.lat_company > (#{lat}-1) AND (#{lat} + 1) > sn.lat_company
AND sn.lng_company > (#{lng}-1) AND (#{lng} + 1) > sn.lng_company
order by ACOS(SIN((#{lat} * 3.1415) / 180 ) *SIN((lat_company * 3.1415) / 180 ) +COS((#{lat} * 3.1415) / 180 ) * COS((lat_company * 3.1415) / 180 ) *COS((#{lng}* 3.1415) / 180 - (lng_company * 3.1415) / 180 ) ) * 6380 asc
limit #{index},#{size}

SELECT count(sn.mm_emp_id) FROM mm_emp sn WHERE 1=1 AND sn.mm_emp_type = '0'
AND sn.lat_company > (#{lat}-1) AND (#{lat} + 1) > sn.lat_company
AND sn.lng_company > (#{lat}-1) AND (#{lng} + 1) > sn.lng_company
mapper.update: UPDATE mm_emp SET mm_emp_card=#{mm_emp_card}, mm_emp_cover=#{mm_emp_cover}, mm_emp_company_pic=#{mm_emp_company_pic}, mm_emp_company=#{mm_emp_company}, mm_emp_company_address=#{mm_emp_company_address}, is_upate_profile=#{is_upate_profile} WHERE mm_emp_id=#{mm_emp_id}
UPDATE mm_emp set userId=#{userId}, channelId=#{channelId}, deviceType=#{type} WHERE mm_emp_id=#{id}
UPDATE mm_emp set mm_emp_cover=#{mm_emp_cover} WHERE mm_emp_id=#{mm_emp_id}
